text: "Put a Little Love in Your Heart" is a 1969 song by Jackie DeShannon and is the title track from her LP Put a Little Love in Your Heart. It topped the single charts in South Africa. ==Annie Lennox and Al Green version== In 1988, it was covered by Annie Lennox and Al Green for the 1988 movie Scrooged. It went to number 2 in Canada, number 4 in Austria, number 6 in Australia, number 7 in New Zealand and number 9 in the United States. title: Put a Little Love in Your Heart
